img_above_text:
# Fungiwoman Spirit

## Fungiwoman Location

The Fungiwoman can be found near the Temple of the Yellow Flowers. From the temple entrance, take the path on the left and head up the stairs, taking out enemies as you go. You will come across a small, concrete clearing with two Snake Herbalists and a couple of centipedes to defeat.

Defeat the enemies and run to the back of the clearing. Turn right and make your way up the hill to reach another small clearing containing a shack and three mushrooms. One of these mushrooms is the Fungiwoman.

img_summary:
Preceding Text Summary:
The preceding text describes how to locate the Fungiwoman near the Temple of the Yellow Flowers. It provides detailed directions, including defeating enemies in a concrete clearing and ascending a hill to reach a shack surrounded by three mushrooms, one of which is the Fungiwoman.

In the background, there is a shack-like structure with pots and vegetation nearby, aligning with the description of the Fungiwoman's location.
